sentence:
• salesforce.com, inc. (NYSE: CRM ) reported fiscal third quarter loss per share of $0.12, wider than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of $0.04 a share
• Urban Outfitters, Inc. (NASDAQ: URBN ) posted third quarter earnings per share of $0.47, higher than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.45
• UGI Corp (NYSE: UGI ) reported fourth quarter loss per share of $0.09, narrower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of $0.10 a share
• The Home Depot, Inc. (NYSE: HD ) posted third quarter earnings per share of $0.95, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.89
